CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: A novel conjugated polymer of PBDT-TDPP-S was synthesized , which contains a donor unit of benzo [1,2b:4,5-b′]dithiophene in main chain and an acceptor unit of diketopyrrolopyrrole in side chain.

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBDT-TDPP-S |
| benzo [1,2b:4,5-b′]dithiophene |
| diketopyrrolopyrrole |

The first material, PBDT-TDPP-S, is a novel conjugated polymer that was synthesized. The other two materials, benzo [1,2b:4,5-b′]dithiophene and diketopyrrolopyrrole, are components of the polymer's structure. Benzo [1,2b:4,5-b′]dithiophene is a donor unit in the polymer's main chain, while diketopyrrolopyrrole is an acceptor unit in the polymer's side chain.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After reviewing the paragraph, I realize that there is only one clear "Material Name" entity in the paragraph. Here it is:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBDT-TDPP-S |

The other two entities, benzo [1,2b:4,5-b′]dithiophene and diketopyrrolopyrrole, are not "Material Name" entities on their own, but rather components of the PBDT-TDPP-S polymer. They are not presented as separate materials in the paragraph, but rather as parts of the PBDT-TDPP-S material. Therefore, I will not include them in the table.
